headerDisplay: For help and support please visit our GitHub Wiki. We hope you find this plugin useful!

encodedPassword.title: Encoded Password
encodedPassword.description: If true, the plugin will decode your entered password from a base64 encoded string to plain text and use this to log into eWeLink.

httpHost.title: HTTP Host
httpHost.description: Override the default eWeLink HTTP API host, useful if you need to force a specific region/host.

countryCode.title: Country Code
countryCode.description: Override the default country code sent for login, may help with auth issues for users in other regions.

mode.title: Connection Mode
mode.description: This setting defines how the plugin communicates with your devices. For further guidance, please refer to this wiki article.

disableDeviceLogging.title: Disable Device Logging
disableDeviceLogging.description: If true, updates for all devices will not be added to the log when they are controlled.

debug.title: Debug Logging
debug.description: If true, debug information will be added to the log.

debugFakegato.title: Debug Fakegato
debugFakegato.description: If true, the included Fakegato library will debug to the log.

disablePlugin.title: Disable Plugin
disablePlugin.description: If true, the plugin will remove all accessories and not load the plugin on restart.

singleDevices.title: Single Channel Devices
singleDevices.description: Applies to single-channel switch, light switch and Slampher devices.

label.title: Label
label.description: This setting has no effect except to be a helpful label for identifying which device this is when editing the configuration.

showAsOutlet.title: Show As Outlet
showAsOutlet.description: If true, this accessory will show as an outlet in HomeKit instead of a switch.

ipAddress.title: IP Address
ipAddress.description: You can manually set the IP address for this device if it cannot be discovered by the plugin.

overrideDisabledLogging.title: Override Disabled Logging
overrideDisabledLogging.description: If true, updates for this device will be added to the log, even if the general 'Disable Device Logging' setting is true.

multiDevices.title: Multi Channel Devices
multiDevices.description: Applies to multi-channel switch and light switch devices.

label.title: Label
label.description: This setting has no effect except to be a helpful label for identifying which device this is when editing the configuration.

showAsOutlet.title: Show As Outlets
showAsOutlet.description: If true, this accessory will show as outlets in HomeKit instead of switches.

inUsePowerThreshold.title: Outlet 'In Use' Threshold
inUsePowerThreshold.description: Applies to DUALR3 devices. HomeKit will set the 'In Use' status of outlet devices to true when the wattage is above this number. Must be 0 or more.

hideChannels.title: Hide Channels
hideChannels.description: A comma separated list of channels to hide for this device. For example '0' or '0,1,2'.

ipAddress.title: IP Address
ipAddress.description: You can manually set the IP address for this device if it cannot be discovered by the plugin.

overrideDisabledLogging.title: Override Disabled Logging
overrideDisabledLogging.description: If true, updates for this device will be added to the log, even if the general 'Disable Device Logging' setting is true.

label.title: Label
label.description: This setting has no effect except to be a helpful label for identifying which device this is when editing the configuration.

showAsSwitch.title: Show As Switch
showAsSwitch.description: If true, this accessory will show as a switch in HomeKit instead of an outlet.

inUsePowerThreshold.title: Outlet 'In Use' Threshold
inUsePowerThreshold.description: HomeKit will set the 'In Use' status of outlet devices to true when the wattage is above this number. Must be 0 or more.

ipAddress.title: IP Address
ipAddress.description: You can manually set the IP address for this device if it cannot be discovered by the plugin.

overrideDisabledLogging.title: Override Disabled Logging
overrideDisabledLogging.description: If true, updates for this device will be added to the log, even if the general 'Disable Device Logging' setting is true.

lightDevices.title: Light Devices
lightDevices.description: Applies to dimmer, bulb and LED strip devices.

label.title: Label
label.description: This setting has no effect except to be a helpful label for identifying which device this is when editing the configuration.

bulbModel.title: Device Model
bulbModel.description: If your model is not listed then you do not need to set this.

brightnessStep.title: Brightness Step
brightnessStep.description: A minimum step for the brightness slider in the Home app. Must be 1 or more.

adaptiveLightingShift.title: Adaptive Lighting Shift
adaptiveLightingShift.description: An adjustment factor for Adaptive Lighting. The mired value for each update will be increased by this setting, making the light appear warmer. A value in the range 50-200 should be appropriate. Must be 0 or more.

ipAddress.title: IP Address
ipAddress.description: You can manually set the IP address for this device if it cannot be discovered by the plugin. Only applicable to Sonoff D1.

overrideDisabledLogging.title: Override Disabled Logging
overrideDisabledLogging.description: If true, updates for this device will be added to the log, even if the general 'Disable Device Logging' setting is true.

thDevices.title: Thermostat Devices
thDevices.description: Applies to thermostat devices and the TH10/16.

label.title: Label
label.description: This setting has no effect except to be a helpful label for identifying which device this is when editing the configuration.

hideSwitch.title: Hide Switch
hideSwitch.description: If true, this accessory will hide the TH10/16 switch from HomeKit.

offset.title: Temperature Offset
offset.description: You can offset the temperature that the sensor reads. An offset of 2 means 2 degrees will be added to the recorded temperature. Can be positive or negative and can include a decimal point '.'.

minTarget.title: Minimum Target Temperature
minTarget.description: Minimum target temperature for TH10/16 thermostat simulation to show in HomeKit apps. Must be 0 or more.

maxTarget.title: Maximum Target Temperature
maxTarget.description: Maximum target temperature for TH10/16 thermostat simulation to show in HomeKit apps. Must be 1 or more, and greater than the minimum value set above.

overrideDisabledLogging.title: Override Disabled Logging
overrideDisabledLogging.description: If true, updates for this device will be added to the log, even if the general 'Disable Device Logging' setting is true.

label.title: Label
label.description: This setting has no effect except to be a helpful label for identifying which device this is when editing the configuration.

hideLight.title: Hide Light Switch
hideLight.description: If true, the light switch will be hidden from HomeKit.

overrideDisabledLogging.title: Override Disabled Logging
overrideDisabledLogging.description: If true, updates for this device will be added to the log, even if the general 'Disable Device Logging' setting is true.

sensorDevices.title: Sensor Devices
sensorDevices.description: Applies to the DW2 and Zigbee sensor devices.

label.title: Label
label.description: This setting has no effect except to be a helpful label for identifying which device this is when editing the configuration.

lowBattThreshold.title: Low Battery Threshold
lowBattThreshold.description: HomeKit will set the low battery status for this device when the battery (if it has one) reaches this percentage level. Must be 5 or more.

hideLongDouble.title: Hide Long & Double Press
hideLongDouble.description: If true, double and long press options will be hidden for this Zigbee Button.

scaleBattery.title: Scale Battery
scaleBattery.description: If true, the battery reading for this Zigbee Contact Sensor will be multiplied by 10.

sensorTimeDifference.title: Sensor Lag
sensorTimeDifference.description: An offset in seconds to ignore any notifications if they is a delay between this Zigbee Motion Sensor detecting something and the plugin receiving the notification. Must be 10 or more.

overrideDisabledLogging.title: Override Disabled Logging
overrideDisabledLogging.description: If true, updates for this device will be added to the log, even if the general 'Disable Device Logging' setting is true.

bridgeSensors.title: RF Sensor Devices
bridgeSensors.description: Applies to RF Bridge sensors to expose different sensor types (more info).

fullDeviceId.title: Sensor Device ID
fullDeviceId.description: Device ID of the sensor (13 digits normally in the format 1000ab23cdSW2).

label.title: Label
label.description: This setting has no effect except to be a helpful label for identifying which device this is when editing the configuration.

type.title: Sensor Type
type.description: Select the type of sensor you would like to expose this as.

sensorTimeLength.title: Sensor Time Length
sensorTimeLength.description: The number of seconds which the sensor tile in the Home app will light up for if this sensor is activated. Must be 1 or more.

sensorTimeDifference.title: Sensor Lag
sensorTimeDifference.description: An offset in seconds to ignore any notifications if they is a delay between a sensor detecting something and the plugin receiving the notification. Must be 10 or more.

overrideDisabledLogging.title: Override Disabled Logging
overrideDisabledLogging.description: If true, updates for this device will be added to the log, even if the general 'Disable Device Logging' setting is true.

groups.title: Accessory Simulations
groups.description: Set up simulated accessories from generic switch devices (more info).

label.title: Label
label.description: This setting has no effect except to be a helpful label for identifying which device this is when editing the configuration.

type.title: Type
type.description: The new type for this device.

oneOf.title: 1 Garage Door (with single or multi channel device)
1 Lock (with single or multi channel device)
1 Tap/Faucet (with single or multi channel device)
1 Irrigation Valve (with single or multi channel device)

setup.title: Device Setup
setup.description: The type of generic device being used.

operationTime.title: Operation Time (Deciseconds)
operationTime.description: Blinds/garage doors: the time to open/close the device. Locks: the time to show as unlocked. This setting is in deciseconds - count the time in seconds and multiply by 10, for example 75 for 7.5 seconds. Must be 20 or more.

operationTimeDown.title: Operation Time Down (Deciseconds)
operationTimeDown.description: If your garage door or blind has a different operation time for up and down, use this setting to specify the operation time DOWN (in deciseconds) and the other setting to specify the operation time UP. Otherwise leave blank. Must be 20 or more.

sensorId.title: Sensor
sensorId.description: A DW2 sensor can be used for a single garage door to determine the current state. Enter the 10 digit eWeLink device ID (normally in the format 1000ab23cd). Otherwise leave blank.

obstructId.title: Obstruction Switch
obstructId.description: An optional switch that will trigger the Obstruction Detected feature depending on its value. Otherwise leave blank.

ipAddress.title: IP Address
ipAddress.description: You can manually set the IP address for this device if it cannot be discovered by the plugin.

overrideDisabledLogging.title: Override Disabled Logging
overrideDisabledLogging.description: If true, updates for this device will be added to the log, even if the general 'Disable Device Logging' setting is true.

items.title: Device ID
items.description: eWeLink device id of the device to ignore, e.g. 10009553c8.

layout.title: Single Channel Devices
layout.description: Applies to single-channel switch, light switch and Slampher devices.

layout.title: Multi Channel Devices
layout.description: Applies to multi-channel switch and light switch devices.

layout.title: Light Devices
layout.description: Applies to dimmer, bulb and LED strip devices.

layout.title: Thermostat Devices
layout.description: Applies to thermostat devices and the TH10/16.

layout.title: Sensor Devices
layout.description: Applies to the DW2 and Zigbee sensor devices.

layout.title: RF Sensor Devices
layout.description: Applies to RF Bridge sensors to expose different sensor types (more info).

items.helpvalue: <label class="control-label text-warning">⚠ Any changes you make to a sensor will reset its connected RF Bridge, resetting all its devices' HomeKit names, room associations and automations.</label>

layout.title: Accessory Simulations
layout.description: Set up simulated accessories from generic switch devices (more info).

items.helpvalue: <label class="control-label text-warning">⚠ If you find this accessory hasn't set up properly after restarting, then try removing it from the cache so it is re-added.</label>
